theorem _root_.isEven_of_isOdd (x : Nat) : isEven (x+1) = isOdd x := by simp [isEven]
@[scoped simp] theorem _root_.isOdd_of_isEven (x : Nat) : isOdd (x+1) = isEven x := by simp [isOdd]
example : isEven (x+1+1) = isEven x := by simp
end Ex
example : isEven (x+1+1) = isEven x := by simp (config := { failIfUnchanged := false }
